OOC: This OOC is on the top. Yadda yadda. I will answer the questions below=
 my post, though.

BIC: The Radicons arrive at the Maximal City. WHEW! Deem=
os and Holocaust look back to make sure the rest are following them.

OOC: =
I now answer the questions! Call me now for a free reading!

1: Dewboy goes=
 on vacation at the same time as Firestorm does, or at least that's what I =
heard.

2: I remember, you wanted to ask who took the last chip. Wasn't me.=


3: I'm not waiting for a reply.

4: Wasn't me, honest, it was that idiot =
Tex Caldwell!

5: Hey Megan, I hope you got what you really wanted, a tree =
that grows TP so that you can TP Hedge's house. (Realizes what he said and =
slowly sneaks away)

6: I have no money, I blew it all on slug eating conte=
sts that didn't involve any slugs.

7: Yeah! Thinner was cool, but not as g=
ood as the book. Payback was pretty neat, and I loved Love Stinks.

8: Mayb=
e they're Dewboy Protohumans, those ones can do ANYTHING.

9: I don't exist=
 either, so don't feel bad.

10: No it isn't, what you meant to say was GOR=
E!!!...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: hugar_twriker@... 
 =
 To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 30, 2001 8:58 PM
  Subjec=
t: IM BACK, Somewhat(OOC)


  OOC: UGH!  No sleep does a body good...  Well=
 anyway, I just read 
  about 200 Emails.  So if I am off on my next posts =
bare with me...  
  If Anything amaing or Important happen While I was gone=
 then please 
  let me know.  I read Most of the Post and I got a few thing=
s to 
  say.     
     First, To Dewboy~  Dewboy, can you tell me when you =
go on vaction, 
  so I can plan my vacations then so when I come back I don=
't have to 
  read 50 OOC...
     Second ~ I forgot.... COME ON NO SLEEP!!!=

     Third, To all who are waiting for my Reply to their characters ~ I 
 =
 will be Replying shortly(If I don't fall asleep.)
     Fourth ~ WHO EGGED =
AND TPED MY HOUSE WHILE I WAS GONE....
     5th, to Megan ~ HAPPY BIRTHDAY =
TO YOU
     Sixth, TO ALL, Can someone send me $50???
     Seventh ~ Seen a=
ny good Movies?
     8th, To Dewboy ~ I saw in one of your post while I was=
 skimming 
  throught that you were Talking to a ProtoHuman, The Problem I =
see is 
  that ProtoHumans can't speaking English...
     9th does not exis=
t
     10th(Yeah, I got 10) Well that is it...
